title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 8101.13 - Town of Colonie
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 8101.13 - Town of Colonie

State Regulations
(a) Route 7. The eastbound and westbound roadways of Route 7 between IR 787 and IR 87 in the

Town of Colonie. (b) Route 155 (Old

Wolf Road and Watervliet Shaker Road). The northbound and southbound roadways
of Old Wolf Road and the eastbound and westbound roadways of Watervliet Shaker

Road between Albany Shaker Road and IR 87 Exit 5 northbound entrance
ramp. (c) Avis Drive. The
northbound and southbound roadways of Avis Drive between its dead- end
termination and Wade Road. (d) Wade

Road. The northbound and southbound roadways of Wade Road between Route 7 and

Old Niskayuna Road. (e) Apollo

Drive. The entire eastbound and westbound roadways of Apollo Drive west of

Route 155 (New Karner Road). (f) [Repealed]
(g) Watervliet Shaker

Road. The eastbound and westbound roadways of Watervliet Shaker Road between
its westerly dead-end termination and Route 155 (Old Wolf Road/Watervliet

Shaker Road) intersection. (h) Albany Street. The eastbound and westbound roadways of Albany Street between

Route 155 (New Karner Road) and Old Karner Road. (i) [Repealed]
(j) Sicker Road (Old Niskayuna Road

Extension). The eastbound and westbound roadways of Sicker Road (Old Niskayuna

Road Extension) between Wade Road and the westerly dead-end termination of

Sicker Road (Old Niskayuna Road Extension). (k) [Repealed]
(l) Brown Road. The northbound and southbound
roadways of Brown Road between Warehouse Road and a point 0.1+- mile north of

Warehouse Road. (m) Warehouse Row. Warehouse Row (Road) between Railroad Avenue and Fuller Road. (n) Terminal Drive. The eastbound and
westbound roadways of Terminal Drive from its westerly dead end to Wolf Road, CR 153, in the Town of Colonie. (o) CR 151 (Albany Shaker Road). The northbound and southbound roadways of CR 151
from Route 7 to the Albany County Airport access road; provided, however, that
this route shall not be used by vehicles of more than 96 inches in
width. (p) Albany County Airport
access road. The northbound and southbound roadways of the Albany County

Airport access road from CR 151 to CR 151; provided, however, that this route
shall not be used by vehicles of more than 96 inches in width. (q) CR 151 (Albany Shaker Road). The
eastbound and westbound roadways of CR 151 from the Albany County Airport
access road to Wolf Road; provided, however, that this route shall not be used
between the hours of 7 a.m. to 9 a.m. and 4 p.m. to 6 p.m. and shall not be
used by vehicles of more than 96 inches in width. (r) [Reserved]
(s) Route US 9. The northbound and southbound
roadways of Route US 9 between Route 7 (the "new" Route 7) and the

Albany-Saratoga county line in the Town of Colonie. (t) Railroad Avenue. The northbound and
southbound roadways of Railroad Avenue between Maplewood Avenue and Fuller Road
in the Town of Colonie. (u) Green

Mountain Drive. The northbound and southbound roadways of Green Mountain Drive
between Arrowhead Lane and Fonda Road, a distance of 0.4+- mile. (v) Fonda Road. The eastbound and westbound
roadways of Fonda Road between Green Mountain Drive and US Route 9, a distance
of 0.4+- mile. (w) Old Niskayuna

Road. Old Niskayuna Road between the Old Niskayuna Road Extension/Sicker Road
intersection northerly to a point 0.4+- mile north of the Old Niskayuna Road

Extension/Sicker Road intersections. (x) Arrowhead Lane. Arrowhead Lane, between
US Route 9 and Green Mountain Drive. (y) Cordell Road. Cordell Road from Preston

Trucking east side terminal to Kings Road. (z) Kings Road. Kings Road between Cordell

Road and Morris Road. (aa)

Morris

Road. Morris Road between Roadway Services, Inc. east side terminal and the

Curry Road/Curry Road Extension intersection. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17
ยง
8101.13

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
